trans-unit.source: Defines an interest in specific workflow status events that occur in a root workflow instance; used for matching by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint"></xref> in a tracking profile.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Whenever the status of the workflow instance changes, the workflow instance emits a workflow status event based on one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
A WorkflowTrackingLocation expresses an interest in locations of the workflow instance where specific types of workflow status events occur.

Add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> to specify the workflow status events to be matched.
A single WorkflowTrackingLocation may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.

You can add a WorkflowTrackingLocation to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in order to define the match parameters for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation"></xref> class.
No workflow status events to match are specified.

You must add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> to match any workflow status events.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation"></xref> class that matches the specified tracking workflow events.
IList of tracking workflow events to be matched.
Gets the list of workflow status events that will be matched for this location.
Events contains the list of workflow status events for which this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> will be matched.

You can track the specified workflow status events by adding the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> that is part of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
A list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent"></xref> values that specifies the workflow status events for which the location will be matched.
The default is an empty list.
